details:
Damien Diederen discovered that SASL quorum peer authentication within
Zookeeper, a service for maintaining configuration information, was
insufficiently enforced in some configurations.


For the oldstable distribution (bullseye), this problem has been fixed
in version 3.4.13-6+deb11u1.


For the stable distribution (bookworm), this problem has been fixed in
version 3.8.0-11+deb12u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your zookeeper packages.


For the detailed security status of zookeeper please refer to
its security tracker page at:
[\
https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/zookeeper](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/zookeeper)
